AudioActiveReference::HandleInsidePlayer AudioPlayerEvent::m_handle
 

The handle uniquely identifying the sound within the player.

AudioActiveReference::PlaybackState AudioPlayerEvent::m_playback_state
 

The state that the sound is in ("driver truth"). AudioPriorityManager will use this to keep in sync with driver truth.

The player playing the sound.
